text: Tate aneka suspasta nidarsana ache [1], yemana makame ibarahima [2]. Ara ye ke'u sekhane prabesa kare se nirapada [3]. Ara manusera madhye yara sekhane ya'oyara samarthya ache, allahâ€Œra uddesye ai gharera hajba [4] kara tara jan'ya abasya kartabya [5]. Ara ye ke'u kuphari karala se jene rakhuka, niscaya allaha srstijagatera mukhapeksi nana
